ygData.subject: Re: Prisoner of War
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Ya, Skullgrin is part of the Decepticon faction consisting of MotorMaster, Triggerhappy and the others. ... Orchestra stopped kissing Blackmightmare.

OOC: Ya, Skullgrin is part of the Decepticon faction consisting of
MotorMaster, Triggerhappy and the others.

::Orchestra/Skullgrin/Triggerhappy::

          Orchestra stopped kissing Blackmightmare.

          "Well...See ya later," he said.

            He then quickly boosted off to Zone 5 at full speed.  Later he
landed, and saw Darkfate.

            "Sir, sorry for my tardiness!  I guess that won't get me up in
the ranks!  What orders do you have for me, sir?" He asked, trying not to
think of Blacknightmare.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
           Skullgrin's vision was restored.  He didn't care about HotRod
anymore.  But he couldn't waste his enemy.  This was not a sign of
intelligence, Skullgrin remained dumb as ever in Pretender mode, but it was
an instinct.  Skullgrin lifted his sword with Hot Rod still on it and
quickly swung it at Cheetor, dodiging the blades, so that Hot Rod and the
sword would smack Cheetor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
           Triggerhappy brought out his gun, and put the tip of it right at
Condor's forehead.

            "Like my friend Astroblast says, shut your mouth and remain
still!  And if you even think of making a move, such as kicking away my gun,
Blowpipe over there will have fry you faster than you can blink!" He said.

            Blowpipe fixed "his" lasers on Condor, ready to blast him if he
tried anything funny.
